name: Plague: Doctor vs Inquisitor
description:
*** A branching storyline. You choose the path you take
*** 12 different endings
*** 50 different illnesses with unique symptoms and gory details
*** Over 200 game characters to interact with

+++ Play as one of the five characters: Barber, Chemist, Scholarship, Wise Woman, Monk.
+++ Diagnose the patient and choose the most appropriate treatment.
+++ Conduct experiments to boost your knowledge.
+++ Go on quests, but be careful! A wrong decision can bring on the untimely death of your character.
+++ Invest the coins you earn into medical institutions, buy books on medicine or bribe the inquisition.
